name: Sorrow (Nomad Studio)
description:
Story

You wake up in a dark dungeon, without any recollection of how you got there. You are equipped with a sword and some armor. It's time to find your way out.

Gameplay

- Use the arrow keys to move around the map.

- Use A to attack

- Find stuff

- That's about it.. hope you enjoy!

To be continued...

This demo was created for LynxJam 2021 and was a good opportunity to think about a new idea for a new game. Set in a Lovecraftian world, an overworld to be explored and more dungeons to battle bosses in. Who know what else..

The Third Jab

- Ninjabba, creator of Wyvern Tales
- Exofrenon, pixels are in his blood
- SideFX, does miracles for music ans sound effects
